title: The Incidental Muslim: Undiluted perspectives on life, love and pop culture
description: The Incidental Muslim is an honest, witty and heartfelt collection of columns and new musings by writer Amal Awad on growing up in Australia as a hybrid identity, with a look at career, life, love, feminism and her love of storytelling (even though Hollywood just can't get their portrayals of Muslims right).
author: Amal Awad
